name: Super Cube (AYADIGames)
description:
Super Cube is a Bundle of Five 3d simple Endless games based on real games

1 flappy cube: Tap screen to flap.

2 heli cube: Touch and hold screen to boost.

3 lizard cube: Tap left side to jump. Tap right side to change color.

4 voxel cube: Touch Screen and drag to move.

5 sun cube: drag to avoid obstacles
